column4: and i'm back.. got off because i was afraid the processor was going to overheat... wol: i used gparted to partition the hardrive.. clicked "install". got to the 'prepare partitions' part and it still does nothing...
maybe suse has something which prevents ubuntu from overwriting it ;)
i saw that before, but I think it was fedora having something that a later fedora wouldn't touch
so I doubt it's Ubuntu specific
